tight or too loose keep going common abbreviations and stitches used in this pattern single_crochet single_crochet stitch st chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch shell st 5 double_crochet in 1 st special instructions & notes work all stitches thru both loops circumference = measurement around the head to determine hat circumference as you make your increase rounds you may note that it is shaped like a hexagon if you measure along one edge of the hexagon and multiply that number by 6 you will get the approximate circumference of your hat for a larger circumference do more increase rounds for a smaller circumference do fewer increase rounds pattern increase rounds note you will be increasing 6 st each round use an adjustable loop or chain 4 and join with a slip_stitch to form a
